About js4ms

Parent pom for JS4MS subprojects.

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
common Utility classes used in other js4ms packages.
io Stream and message channel classes used in other js4ms packages.
ip Classes for parsing and constructing various IP protocol messages.
amt Parent project for JS4MS jars.
server Components for implementing connection oriented services.
rest Core components for implementing RESTful protocols such as HTTP and RTSP.
http HTTP protocol classes.
rtsp RTSP service components.
launcher Classes used to launch Java VM and Java Web Start applications as independent processes.
reflector RTSP multicast reflector application.
js4ms-jsdk Parent project for JS4MS jars.
jnlp-app RTSP multicast reflector Java Web Start application.
jnlp-webapp Parent project for the RTSP multicast reflector Java Web Start application.
js4ms-jws-reflector Parent project for the RTSP multicast reflector Java Web Start application.
